featured.text: Despite the economic and environmental hurdles, desalination is becoming increasingly attractive as human beings are using up fresh water from other sources.

definition.zh_def: 障礙，困難；跨越障礙的賽跑項目
definition.en_def: A barrier or obstacle that must be overcome; also refers to a race in which competitors jump over such barriers.
definition.example: She faced many hurdles on her path to success, but she never gave up.
